document.full_text: in the dry wording of prosecution documents, sex parties at italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's palatial villa followed a well scripted routine drawing in erotic dancers and underage prostitutes.
document.title: sex, cash and starlets: berlusconi's "rubygate"
lines_and_colors: in the dry wording of prosecution documents, sex parties at italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's palatial villa followed a well scripted routine drawing in erotic dancers and underage prostitutes.
